heroText: Building fast & useful frontend for cool products
aboutText:
Hi, I am Fl√°vio. Since I started my career I have been working with Visual Design of things.

I have always been interested in technology and development too. So I worked a few times as developer and wrote frontend and backend code for projects.

In 2021 I decided to focus my career entirely on frontend development.

At this time I'm looking for a frontend job, learning cool stuff like React and Vue and bringing life to my own projects.
